overview.challenge: After winning younger buyers in culture, Lexus faced a new challenge. Repositioned Lexus as a digital leader.
overview.solution: Transforming Lexus.com wasn't just a redesign, it was a business shift. A modular platform, integrated dealership ecosystem, and bold creative positioned Lexus as a digital leader.
overview.impact: Repositioned Lexus as a digital leader with a modular platform that enabled rapid innovation.

slides.title: Lexus.com
slides.description: I led the design and development of the Lexus digital ecosystem for a decade. A platform built to scale across models, markets, devices and dealerships, all while upholding extremely high creative standards and delighting luxury shoppers.
